value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|And so we meet, Princess Fjorm, of
Nifl, the Kingdom of Ice.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|And you are?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Call me Marth. I have vowed to fight
the chaos caused by the Tempest.$k$pPrincess Fjorm... I ask for your aid, so
that this world might be restored.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Restored? My kingdom, Nifl, could be
saved?$k$pVery well. I have resolved to face any
battle that would restore my
homeland.$k$pEven so...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|You're asking that I throw myself into
danger. How do I know that I can trust
you in the heat of battle?$k$pCan you prove your loyalty to me?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I've asked you to have faith in me,
and yet I hide behind a mask... I
understand.$k$pIs there nothing I can do to earn your
trust?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|A good question. Perhaps...$k$pYes... May I hold your sword for just
a moment?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|You wish to hold Falchion?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Yes. That would prove to me that you
bear me no ill will...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Very well. If that is what it will take for
you to believe in me, then I shall let
you hold my blade.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Do this, and you will have my trust.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Stop!$k$pYou can't trust her!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, dearie me...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Who are you, and why are you
impersonating me?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Two princesses?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh my, my, my... That didn't take
long.$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|We were so close to the best part...
What a shame.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I am Loki, an agent of chaos. The
opposite of you, my dear...$k$pI'll wait for you in the depths of the
Tempest. See you later, sweetie.$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My, my. So it goes.$k$p$EFace|Not that it matters. I'll simply retreat...$k$pFor now.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Wait! Who are you? What do you
want?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|What do I want? The joy of destroying
worlds, and spreading chaos...$k$pWould you rather stare at a stone
sitting by the side of a road, or watch
it tumble down a cliffside?$k$p$EFace_Cool|As it tumbles, it may, of course,
crumble into dust... And yet...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|If you want to stop me, all you have to
do is try. That would also kill my
boredom...$k$pFarewell, dear Marth. I look forward to
our next meeting, my dear.$k$p
